name: Algebra.FormallyEtale.pi_iff
initialProofState:
R : Type (max u v)
I : Type u
A : I → Type (max u v)
inst✝³ : CommRing R
inst✝² : (i : I) → CommRing (A i)
inst✝¹ : (i : I) → Algebra R (A i)
inst✝ : Finite I
⊢ Iff (Algebra.FormallyEtale R ((i : I) → A i)) (∀ (i : I), Algebra.FormallyEtale R (A i))
decl:
theorem pi_iff [Finite I] :
    FormallyEtale R (Π i, A i) ↔ ∀ i, FormallyEtale R (A i) := by
  simp_rw [FormallyEtale.iff_unramified_and_smooth, forall_and]
  rw [FormallyUnramified.pi_iff A, FormallySmooth.pi_iff A]

name: Algebra.FormallyEtale.instForallOfFinite
initialProofState:
R : Type (max u v)
I : Type u
A : I → Type (max u v)
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R
inst✝³ : (i : I) → CommRing (A i)
inst✝² : (i : I) → Algebra R (A i)
inst✝¹ : Finite I
inst✝ : ∀ (i : I), Algebra.FormallyEtale R (A i)
⊢ Algebra.FormallyEtale R ((i : I) → A i)
decl:
instance [Finite I] [∀ i, FormallyEtale R (A i)] : FormallyEtale R (Π i, A i) :=
  .of_unramified_and_smooth
